chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here is a proposed itinerary for your 3-day trip to Las Vegas:

## Day 1:
- 8:34 - Depart St. Louis on flight F3963082, costing $594.
- 10:03 - Arrive in Las Vegas. Check into your accommodation, **Cozy Studio Apt-One block away from Prospect Park!** (price: $108 per night).
- 12:00 - Visit **Springs Preserve** (address: 333 S Valley View Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89107), an outdoor museum and botanical garden with trails, wildlife, and a nature exchange.
- 14:00 - Head over to **Chili's Grill & Bar** (2000 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89104) for some lunch, which serves pizza, Mexican food, and more.
- 16:00 - Take a trip to the **Shark Reef Aquarium at Mandalay Bay** (3950 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89119) to see a variety of marine life, including sharks, rays, and more.
- 18:00 - Finish the day with dinner at **New York Slice - Express** (pizza, BBQ, Chinese, seafood), followed by a visit to the **Eiffel Tower Viewing Deck** (3655 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109) to admire the cityscape.

## Day 2:
- 9:00 - Start the day at the **Las Vegas Natural History Museum** (900 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101), where you can learn about the natural history of the region and see exhibits on dinosaurs, marine life, and more.
- 11:00 - Take a trip to **AREA15** (3215 S Rancho Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89102), a unique retail and entertainment complex featuring immersive art installations, virtual reality experiences, and more.
- 13:00 - Visit the **Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign** (5100 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89119) and take some photos.
- 14:00 - Go to **Ethos Vegan Kitchen** (desserts, bakery, cafe, Mediterranean, seafood) for lunch.
- 15:00 - Experience the thrill of the **SlotZilla Zipline Las Vegas** (425 Fremont St #160, Las Vegas, NV 89101) and soar over the city's famous Fremont Street.
- 17:00 - Visit the **Neon Museum Las Vegas** (770 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101) and learn about the city's iconic neon signs.
- 19:00 - Have dinner at **Behrouz Biryani** (pizza, Italian, BBQ, bakery, seafood), followed by a trip to the **Observation Deck** (2000 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89104) for a panoramic view of the city lights.

## Day 3:
- 8:00 - Head to the **Fremont Street Experience** (E Fremont St, Las Vegas, NV 89101) for the morning, a pedestrian mall with live performances, light shows, and various attractions.
- 11:00 - Enjoy a leisurely lunch at **Big Brewsky** (tea, bakery, fast food), followed by a visit to **Madame Tussauds Las Vegas** (3377 S Las Vegas Blvd Ste. 2001, Las Vegas, NV 89109) to see lifelike wax figures of famous people.
- 14:00 - Take a gondola ride at **The Venetian** (3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109) and enjoy the Italian-inspired architecture.
- 16:00 - Visit **The Mob Museum** (300 Stewart Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89101) to learn about the history of organised crime in Las Vegas and the United States.
- 18:00 - Finish your trip with dinner at **Hawalat Lounge & Bar** (cafe, Mexican, Indian, BBQ) before departing for St. Louis on flight F3991093 at 19:04, which will cost $575.

### Estimated Budget:
- Flights: $1169
- Accommodation ($108/night for 2 nights): $216
- Food and Attractions: Assuming a budget of ~$500, this should be a reasonable estimate for meals and activities based on the average prices provided.

This itinerary offers a mix of indoor and outdoor activities, as well as a variety of dining options. Let me know if you would like any adjustments or additional suggestions!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
